name: Buff Knight Advanced
summary: Buff Knight Advanced is a 2D Pixel RPG where you’re constantly on the move. Kill the invading monsters with your sword or by timing your use of spells carefully! As you progress the game becomes more intense with stronger and uglier monsters!
info:
• 别名: 勇者には休みがないADVANCED
